recommended_actions.description: E session note quality is poor — 4/6 recent E sessions have truncated or mid-thought notes captured by the summarize hook ('Here's my situation:', 'Now let me read...'). This is the same pattern that SESSION_AUDIT.md's completion format section was designed to prevent, but E sessions don't follow it. Without proper completion markers, session-history.txt provides no useful signal about what E sessions accomplished.
recommended_actions.action: R session should add a mandatory completion format to SESSION_ENGAGE.md (similar to the A session completion format). E sessions should end with: 'Session E#NN (sNNNN) complete. [1-sentence summary].' The summarize hook already captures this pattern — E sessions just need to output it.

recommended_actions.description: a106-2 (registry reconciliation) was marked done by B#374 (wq-446) but the 26 accounts without credential files were never individually audited. The growth stopped (still 48), so this is stable but the reconciliation wasn't actually performed. Low priority — carry forward for one more audit cycle.
recommended_actions.action: Next B session with spare capacity should run: jq '.accounts[] | select(.has_credentials != true) | .platform' account-registry.json to identify the 26 unmatched accounts and confirm they're all legitimate (probe-stage, anonymous platforms, etc.).
